snippet: Commissioner Gary Bettman said a news report claiming that the N.H.L. was on the verge of taking over the Devils was inaccurate.
abstract: National Hockey League Commissioner Gary Bettman says news report claiming NHL is on the verge of taking over New Jersey Devils is inaccurate, and that NHL might step in to temporarily run team only if a buyer is not found before season begins.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Gary Bettman said a news report claiming that the N.H.L. was on the verge of taking over the Devils was inaccurate.

headline.main: Report of Devils Takeover Is Denied
